Universal- creating a conglomerate that will be the largest cable provider, the largest Internet provider, and one of the largest content producers in the United States- represents a surrender to the demands of corporate America. Once we allow companies to become this powerful, the FCC does not regulate them, said Sen. Bernie Sanders ( I., Vt.). "They regulate the FCC." No reasonable regulator would debate Sen. Kobe Bryant said the Pistons presented a "matchup issue" for the Lakers' defense.
